samples.name: FL_DATA_MISS
samples.description: Check fall back options

samples.name: FL_MVAL0
samples.description: Flag to indicate no more retrieval to be done. True if MVAL0< TH_Mmin0

samples.name: FL_MVAL
samples.description: Flag to indicate no more retrieval to be done. True if MVAL < TH_Mmin1

samples.name: FL_R4_NITM
samples.description: Flag indicating that R4 was attempted, but failed with NITM

samples.name: FL_R4_KDIA
samples.description: Flag indicating R4 was attempted, but failed with KDIA

samples.name: FL_R4_COND
samples.description: Flag to indicate R4 attempted, but failed COND

samples.name: FL_R3_NITM
samples.description: Flag to indicate R37 attempted, failed NITM

samples.name: FL_R3_KDIA
samples.description: Flag to indicate failed KDIA

samples.name: FL_R3_COND
samples.description: Flag to indicate R3 attempted, but failed COND

samples.name: FL_R2_NITM
samples.description: Flag to indicate R2 attempted, but failed NITM

samples.name: FL_R2_KDIA
samples.description: Flag to indicate failed KDIA

samples.name: FL_R2_COND
samples.description: Flag to indicate R2 attempted, but failed COND

samples.name: FL_MD_NITM
samples.description: Flag to indicate additional MD retrieval failed NITM

samples.name: FL_MD_KDIA
samples.description: Flag to indicate failed KDIA

samples.name: FL_MD_COND
samples.description: Flag to indicate Mda failed COND

samples.name: FL_CE
samples.description: Computational exceptions

samples.name: FL_SUN_POINT_C
samples.description: Used to exclude view

samples.name: FL_SUN_GLINT_FOV_C
samples.description: Indicator of possible sun glint effects. Not relevant for SM computations

samples.name: FL_R4_RANGE
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range in R4 retrieval

samples.name: FL_R4_RSTD
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in R4 retrieval

samples.name: FL_R3_RANGE
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range in R3 retrieval

samples.name: FL_R3_RSTD
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in R3 retrieval

samples.name: FL_R2_RANGE
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range in R2 retrieval

samples.name: FL_R2_RSTD
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in R2 retrieval

samples.name: FL_MDA_RANGE
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value is outside the extended valid range

samples.name: FL_MDA_RSTD
samples.description: Set to ON if a retrieved value DQX is greater than the threshold in Mda retrieval

samples.name: USGS_SEA_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 95 percent (1); below 95 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_LAND_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is below 10 percent (1); above 10 percent (0)

samples.name: USGS_MIXED_FLAG
samples.description: Water fraction is above 10 and below 95 percent (1); below 10 or above 95 percent (0)

samples.name: 200_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 200 km (1); greater than 200 km (0)

samples.name: 100_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 100 km (1); greater than 100 km (0)

samples.name: 40_KM_COASTAL_FLAG
samples.description: Distance to coastline is less than 40 km (1); greater than 40 km (0)

samples.name: MIN_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for all months (1); is not present for all months (0)

samples.name: MAX_SEA_ICE_FLAG
samples.description: Sea ice is present for any months (1); is not present for any months (0)

bands.name: N_TB_Range
bands.description: L2 testing TB against range � count of deleted TB measurements

bands.name: RATIO_AVA
bands.description: Ratio of useful views Coded in 2�s complement

bands.name: TAU_LV_IN
bands.description: Read in from its Current Table

bands.name: TAU_LV_IN_DQX
bands.description: Read in from its Current Table

bands.name: TAU_FO_IN
bands.description: Read in from its Current Table

bands.name: TAU_FO_IN_DQX
bands.description: Read in from its Current Table

bands.name: HR_IN
bands.description: Read in from its Current Table

bands.name: HR_IN_DQX
bands.description: Read in from its Current Table

bands.name: Tau_Litter
bands.description: Canopy opacity for litter averaged using Mean WEF for the retrieval fraction

bands.name: TPhys
bands.description: Physical temperature computed using the WEF of the median measured TB for the retrieval fraction

bands.name: Land_Sea_Mask
bands.description: Flag indicating Land/Sea USGS content, Coastline distance, and Ice content
